resource: 1002789.vtc=true 1002789.source=MANUAL_IMPORT 1002789.derived=false 1002789.description=Air Intake: Performance Air Intake is to be sold as a dealer-installed or over-the-counter option, after the retail sale of the vehicle. The Performance Air Intake may not be sold to the customer at the same time as the new vehicle and may not be financed together with the new vehicle.
